justification: The study used a quasi-experimental interrupted time-series design without randomization. A non-equivalent control group of non-parents was included. Sample sizes for parents (132 couples) and non-parents (86 couples) were reported. Attrition and divorce rates were reported and accounted for in analyses. No mention of blinding procedures was found. | No explicit mention of randomization, control group, sample size, attrition, or blinding in the provided snippets.
notes: LLM quick quality applied: success_batches=2, failed_batches=0, total_batches=2.
